title: Public transport for AFL Second Elimination Final: Western Bulldogs v Hawthorn
articleContent:
The AFL Elimination Final 2 – Western Bulldogs v Hawthorn game starts at Friday 6 September, 7:40pm. We're running extra services to and from the MCG to get you there and home again.

Plan your trip to the game using Journey planner.

Metropolitan train disruptions

Cranbourne Line
  • Buses replace night trains between Dandenong and Cranbourne from 8:30pm due to works.

Plan your journey

Set your location to plan your journey.

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
